mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Apart_transaction (id, si_gun_gu, road_name, danji_name, area, floor, build_year, contract_y_m, contract_d, trade_amount) values (#{id}, #{si_gun_gu}, #{road_name}, #{danji_name}, #{area}, #{floor}, #{build_year}, #{contract_y_m},#{contract_d},#{trade_amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE Apart_transaction set si_gun_gu = #{si_gun_gu}, danji_name = #{danji_name}, area = #{area}, floor = #{floor}, build_year = #{build_year}, contract_y_m = #{contract_y_m}, contract_d = #{contract_d}, trade_amount = #{trade_amount} where id = #{id}
